name: Hunter's Howl
text: With a single primal howl, you strike fear in your opponents. Until the end of the spell’s duration, you treat those affected by it as if they were your favored enemy, gaining a +2 bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against them, and a +2 bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks against them. If an affected creature is already one of your favored enemies, it is shaken instead. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.
text_zh: 通过原始的怒嚎，你将恐惧植入敌人心中。直至该法术持续时间结束为止，你会将那些受此影响的敌人视为宿敌，对其使用武器进行的攻击检定以及伤害检定获得+2加值，并在使用唬骗，知识，察觉，察言观色以及生存对抗他们时获得+2加值。如果受影响的生物本身就是你的宿敌，那么它会战栗以取代上述效果。这是一个影响心灵的恐惧效果。
